name: Ragdoll (Aurik-Datta, Ozan Urkmez, Carolx715)
description:
Ragdoll is a game where you must die to progress. Use corpses as tools to get to the next level. This is a  demo. Use corpses to hold down buttons, as platforms, or even a navigation guide. This game has 3 levels. 2 platformer levels that showcase multiple different platforms that were implemented, including flashing walls, moving platforms, gravity inverters and button activated screens. The final level puts you in a cube where all 6 faces are mazes. Travel through these mazes using gravity changing portals and get to the end! 

How to Play:

Use WASD to control character. Use Q to kill yourself and generate corpse. 

Use 1,2,3,4  or scrollwheel to switch between weapons (Only Gun works on some levels)
